name: Food Costing Calculator
description: An intuitive web application to calculate food costs for recipes. Use the AI-powered Recipe Importer to parse ingredients automatically. Features a dynamic costing matrix, a manageable market list, and computes total costs and food cost percentages.
prompt: A web application for calculating food recipe costs. The user provides ingredients, quantities, and purchase prices. The app calculates total cost, cost per serving, and food cost percentage. It includes a market list for storing common ingredient prices. The app also features an AI-powered recipe importer.
